comments.comment: Congratulations  for  your efforts to give the real picture of Kansa .We in Sri Lanka had used this miracle healing plant for thousands of years in our traditional medical formulas(Ayurveda) and in cooking as well.Enen the Lord Buddha prescribed  this plant for healing a Bikku called Pilindawacha in Bissajakanda in Vinayapitaka. It is so sad we are still not legalizing this plant at least for the Ayurvedic doctors since it is used in various formulas.It is only the western rulers(British) ban this plant in 1910 since they wanted to promote alcohol and  western medicine.This is a seaman(Sukra) producing herb and its aphrodisiac and very good for laymen s life(gihi vinaya).At least we should follow the westerners since they are legalizing the usage of this plant realizing the medical value.AYOUBOWAM(May You Live Long).
comments.author: Nimal Warnasuriya
